title: Bradley Cooper enjoys a solo Sunday and shops for books after breakfast in Los Angeles
text:
His star status catapulted to the top with his directorial debut of A Star Is Born.

And Bradley Cooper seemed to be catching up on some much needed 'me time' as he stepped out solo on Sunday in the Brentwood area of Los Angeles.

The 44-year-old actor looked dapper in a navy blue jacket after perusing the aisles of a local book store to pick up a few weekend reads.

Out and about: Bradley Cooper seemed to be catching up on some much needed 'me time' as he stepped out solo on Sunday in the Brentwood area of Los Angeles

The Silver Linings Playbook star enjoyed a morning stroll wearing a light blue buttoned-down shirt underneath his warm coat.

He teamed his autumn-inspired look with a pair of black slacks as he walked through the parking lot with one hand in his pocket.

Cooper sported a pair of black leather shoes with thick white soles and shielded his eyes from the sun with a pair of sunglasses.

Easy read: The 44-year-old actor looked dapper in a navy blue jacket after perusing the aisles of a local book store to pick up a few weekend reads

Bradley's dark blonde hair was tousled on top of his head and he showed off a freshly shaven face.

After indulging in breakfast alone, he perused a book store and was spotted holding a few novels in his hand along with an iPhone.

He'll need all the down time he can muster as his 2020 schedule is jam-packed with new films.

Weekend fun: After indulging in breakfast alone, he perused a book store and was spotted holding a few novels in his hand along with an iPhone

He'll lend his voice as Rocket for the Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3 movie directed by James Gunn.

Also on the docket for 2020 is Nigthmare Alley with Toni Collette and Rooney Mara, Atlantic Wall and Bernstein with Carey Mulligan.

Bradley and supermodel Irina Shayk called it quits back in June after four years together; they share co-parenting responsibilities of daughter Lea De Seine, two.
